channel.title: Buy 1 item 2 diffrent ways tho?
channel.description:
okai so i have choatics on my server like most servers....
and well i have one in my pkp shop worth 200 pkp and 1 in my donator shop work 200 donator points... how do i make it so that in donator shop it's worth 15 donator points and in pkp shop its worth 200?

item.title: Buy 1 item 2 diffrent ways tho?
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

Make two items out of one, with the same stats, just editing the price of the second one.

Read full topic
